sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1

sources.name: source2
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductCategoryKey as integer,
		ProductCategoryAlternateKey as integer,
		EnglishProductCategoryName as string,
		SpanishProductCategoryName as string,
		FrenchProductCategoryName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source2

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Join1 sink(input(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Prop_1 as string,
		Prop_2 as string,
		Prop_3 as string,
		Prop_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
source1, source2 join(ProductCategoryID == ProductCategoryAlternateKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
